definition: To complete or finish off something, typically used when referring to rounding off a number or rounding up a decimal to the nearest whole number.

examples.english: I want to round off the text.
She was able to round off the conversation.
He tried to round off the discussion.

examples.german: Wir sollten den Tag mit einem Lied abrunden.
examples.english: We should round off the day with a song.

examples.german: Der Künstler wollte seine Performance abrunden.
examples.english: The artist wanted to round off his performance.
